build.desc:
Trigger a build with optional parameters
Usage: nestor build [-c/--console] <job> ["param1=value1&param2=value2"]

options.desc: Display console output of the triggered build progress
Follow a specific variant of the build

console.desc:
Display latest build console output
Usage: nestor console <job>

stop.desc:
Stop the currently running build
Usage: nestor stop <job>

dashboard.desc:
View status of all jobs
Usage: nestor dashboard

discover.desc:
Discover Jenkins instance running on a specified host
Usage: nestor discover <host>

executor.desc:
View executors' status (running builds)
Usage: nestor executor

job.desc:
View job status reports
Usage: nestor job <job>

status.desc:
View build status
Usage: nestor status <job> <number>

options.desc: Display console output of the triggered build progress
Follow a specific variant of the build

queue.desc:
View queued jobs
Usage: nestor queue

ver.desc:
View Jenkins version number
Usage: nestor ver

irc.desc:
Start an IRC bot
Usage: nestor irc <host> <channel> [nick]
